metadata.title: CVE-2014-3562 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Red Hat Directory Server 8 and 389 Directory Server, when debugging isenabled, allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive replicated metadata bysearching the directory.

criterions.comment: 389-ds-base: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
